overview: DON'T STOP A.I. JAPAN TOUR is AI's third concert DVD, and fourth overall video release. It contains footage from the last show of her DON'T STOP A.I. JAPAN TOUR at Nippon Budokan, making this her second show there.
tagline: A.I.'s DON"T STOP A.I. JAPAN TOUR
title: DON'T STOP A.I. JAPAN TOUR
